subject: [sugar] Efficiently sharing content across mesh
body:
Does mesh do any compression of data sent across itself?  In other  
words, is there a centralized system for sending a document from one  
laptop to another?  Is that compressed by the OS, or should we pre- 
compress it?

Steve
